name: See the Block Move!
description:
Get to "Win" block, create walls on your path.

Arrow keys to move.

M to Mute/Unmute, R to Restart.

Made for "Last Day of the Decade" game jam, in 3½ hours.

Game engine: Construct 3

Music software: Reaper

Audio Software: Audacity

Web version may lag, download version works. Download version closes with Esc.
